text: @AmandaLeeHouse Lies, damn lies and statistics. I think it depends on how you slice and dice the numbers. In the hospital where I work,  there are 13 of 20 ICU patients intubated for COVID19. Never saw anything close to that for the flu.

domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]
